Text: Thank you is nice But cash is even betterThank you is nice But cash is even better Happy Holidays from SBC We wanted to do more than just say thanks to our customers who view and pay their bill online So to show our appreciation for your patronage were giving you an easy opportunity to win and other cash prizes Win for telling your friends about SBC Online Billing Just like you your friends and family can save time and money by paying their phone bill online So tell them about the convenience of SBC Online Billing and you could win a grand prize in the SBC Tell a Friend and Win Sweepstakes There are ten cash prizes too Enter today then tell of your friends about SBC Online Billing and youll have chances to win Thanks again see you online in Enter today to win msaspHBXXX Official rules msaspHBXXX If for any reason you wish not to receive future emails like this from SBC please use the link below to unsubscribe and we will promptly remove your name from our list musbconbunsubaspeebassenroncom
